mapper.select: SELECT content.content_no,content.content_title,TO_CHAR(content.content_detail) as content_detail, menu.menu_name, likes.user_no as likesUser FROM content JOIN board ON content.content_no = board.content_no JOIN menu ON board.menu_no = menu.menu_no JOIN likes ON content.content_no = likes.content_no WHERE menu.menu_name =#{menu} AND likes.user_no = #{userNo}
select * from content join board using(content_no) join menu using(menu_no) where user_no=#{userNo} and menu_name='video Templates'
